titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
7/31/2014--Introduced. Disapproves the actions taken by the House Committee on the Judiciary and the leadership of the House of Representatives with respect to H.R. 1123 (Unlocking Consumer Choice and Wireless Competition Act).
Directs the leadership of each House committee and the House leadership to operate in a matter that maximizes transparency and public trust.
